original: intros n m A B H1. apply (iffTrans NN _ _ _ H1). apply reduceAddExists with (n := m) (m := n) (A := addForalls m n A) (B := addForalls m n B). apply RepresentableAlternate with (A := A) (B := B). apply extEqualTrans with (n := n) (a := RepresentableHelp _ _ _ H1) (b := RepresentableHelp _ _ _ H1). apply Representable_ext.
